question: Which nation houses the water village, "Kampong Ayer"?
explanation: Kampong Ayer is a river-village settlement located in Bandar Seri Begawan, Brunei. It is a group of stilt villages built on Brunei River. It is nicknamed as the "Venice of the East". It was the principal social and economic centre of the Bruneian Empire, its principal settlement, thereby the de facto capital of the Bruneian Empire.
